name: test_e2e_with_logs[656_SSTI_RAZOR_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SSTI_RAZOR_001` |
| **Name** | Razor .NET Process Execution |
| **Category** | SSTI |
| **Subcategory** | razor |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `@{var x = System.Diagnostics.Process.Start("cmd");}`
- **Encoded**: `%40%7Bvar%20x%20%3D%20System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%28%22cmd%22%29%3B%7D`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~38000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:36:39.000 UTC

|------|-------|

| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SSTI] Server-Side Template Injection detected test_id=SSTI_RAZOR_001-1772192199064-fb974g pattern_id=SSTI_RAZOR_001 uri=/?q=%40%7Bvar%20x%20%3D%20System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%28%22cmd%22%29%3B%7D client=127.0.0.1` |
